awards.title: 2024 Meichu Hackathon Hackers Group - Logitech
awards.summary: The Meichu Hackathon is a competition that includes six companies in the Hackers Group. My team competed in the Logitech division and won first place, allowing us to compete for the grand prize.

awards.title: 2024 Meichu Hackathon Grand Prize
awards.summary: The first-place winners from all six companies competed for the grand prize, and we won second place.
